name: Kalevala: Where Heroes Go To Die
name_original: Kalevala: Where Heroes Go To Die
description:
Kalevala: Where Heroes Go to Die is a narrative-driven text-based game inspired by Finnish mythology. It is an alternate continuation to our national epic and an exploration in what gives myths their power.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Designed, developed, and written by: Niko Nikkilä (https://twitter.com/Coconutmilk)

Menu theme song by: Bryan Teoh (https://www.sleepfacingwest.com)

Visual assets created with:

- Arbreeder (https://www.artbreeder.com/)

- DREAM by Wombo (https://app.wombo.art).

Sounds from Freesound.org, under CC0 license. Credit list here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ivzb9kXS3aWY-SW2VERfZ9p--8-RN2kMUF1U4e_ieo8/... 

Additional programming resources by various users were also used, list here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1751yvUabwDGyxF8K8uLeFdPdveKtrloyjyCrgQ3ryxU/...
